title: nANam ennaDi
sahitya:
nANam ennaDi manamE gOpi nAthanai nI eppOdum kalandirukka


anupallavi

  kANum ulagamellAm vENugAnattilE kAdsa mayamAkkiya rAdhA kAntanai sEra


caraNam    kaNNan ariyAda eNNam onruLLadO kaNNin kONattil eNNam tONudE
viNNaga shuDarukku viLambaram vENDumO vETkai mukhattukku viLakka urai vENDumO
